title: S16 Ep19: Demons Among Us: Shocking Real-Life Stories from the Paranormal
itunes:title: Demons Among Us: Shocking Real-Life Stories from the Paranormal
description:
Darkness Radio encounters Demons Among Us: Shocking Real-Life Stories from the Paranormal with M.R. Gorga

Dave & Tim are joined by guest, M.R. Gorga as we explore; The first fully documented eyewitness account of demonic possession in American history. (Reported decades before the Salem Witch Trials!)Real personal encounters with black spirits, inhuman entities, visions, and terrifying nighttime visitations.

All this plus M.R. Gorga explains how dark forces influence the world around you, to deceive and destroy—even kill. Today, find out IF you are at risk?

Follow him here: www.Facebook.com/mrgorga/ 

Get his Book here:  https://www.amazon.com/.../dp/1733935312/ref=mp_s_a_1_1...
